DataElement.preferredName: Patient Additional Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether a patient/participant is suitable for enrollment in a study according additional protocol criteria and procedures.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Additional Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to determining if a patient/participant is suitable for enrollment in a study according additional protocol criteria and procedures.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary):Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient meet all oth
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient meet all other eligibility criteria?

ReferenceDocuments.name: DCP Document Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant satisfy all remaining eligibility criteria?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient meet all criteria as per protocol that allows the patient to crossover (including that the patient has progressed during treatment)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient meet all eligibility criteria as per protocol that allows the patient to crossover (including that the patient has progressed during treatment)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did not meet other eligibility criteria
